member.name: M:TestAssignment.WebAPI.Controllers.ProfanityListController.GetProfanityList
member.remarks: To get a profanity list.(I have used Profanity Detector nuget profanity list.)

member.name: M:TestAssignment.WebAPI.Controllers.ProfanityListController.AddProfanity(System.String)
member.remarks: To add a profanity to the list. (Profanity Detector NuGet's Profanity List is used.)

member.name: M:TestAssignment.WebAPI.Controllers.ProfanityListController.DeleteProfanity(System.String)
member.remarks: To delete a profanity from the list.(Profanity Detector NuGet's Profanity List is used.)

member.name: M:TestAssignment.WebAPI.Controllers.UploadFileController.UploadTextFile(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.remarks: Asynchronous request to upload text file after profanity check. Only *.txt file less then or equal 2MB is supported. Endpoint counts only unique profanity words and processing time is calculated in milliseconds.
